item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-05-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Peet's Coffee & Tea (Newton Centre) (776 Beacon Street, Langley Road, Newton). #
  • Saw hilarious bathroom @ an apartment on Saturday. Sloped ceiling over bathtub so you couldn't stand up straight & shower. #apartmenthunting #
  • I'm at Prana Cafe (292 Centre St, Pearl St, Newton). #
  • Huffpost - Juan-Carlos Cruz, Food Network Chef, Arrested For Hiring Homeless To Murder Someone #
  • I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1269 Centre St, at Beacon St, Newton). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
